password_explanation.title: Why do I need an additional password?
password_explanation.content:
The password is nessecary for a user friendly environment!

A password in combination with your wallet file will be able to unlock your wallet.

If you lose your password, or want to access your wallet from a new device, you will need your 12-word recovery phrase.
